revised_title: Magnetic Experiments and the Influence of Steel Bars and Artificial Magnets
tldr: Gowin Knight presents a series of magnetic experiments using steel bars and artificial magnets, demonstrating the influence of these materials on the polarity and attraction of magnetic objects. The experiments show how the polarity of a needle can be altered by touching it to steel bars or artificial magnets, and how the strength of the magnet can be increased or decreased depending on the materials used.
